website_summaries.verdict: Relatively fast and very easy to use, the Linksys E1500 Wireless-N router with SpeedBoost is a good fit for home users, especially those with little networking know-how.
pros: The Linksys E1500 Wireless-N router with SpeedBoost has a nice, compact design and offers good performance
It's affordable and comes with Cisco Connect, an intuitive software application that helps you set up and manage a home wireless network with ease
cons: The Linksys E1500 lacks advanced features such as dual-band, Gigabit Ethernet, and support for USB devices
Its Guest Networking feature only supports a maximum of 10 clients at a time

customer_reviews.title: Router review
customer_reviews.text: I chose this router over the E1200 because it promised more router for the same price. Other reviews were promising. Setup was easy....The computer did all the work. You plug in the router, put the CD into a laptop (in my case) that wasn't even attached and the software did its thing in about 5 minutes. A network name and password are offered or you can change if you wish. Guest network with password also set up automatically for you. Easy to change, just click Change. Haven't compared speeds and distance to my old linksys router yet, but so far it is doing its job and looks so sleek and unassuming in its corner. Great value for less than $50.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Solved Problem of Internet Crashing
customer_reviews.text: I had a Dlink router. I kept losing my Cox Cable internet several times a day and called Cox for help. We finally decided that it was the router and not the modem or Cox connection. I asked the techrep what router she would recommend and she recommended Linksys. I ordered one from Amazon, followed the direction from the CD, and installed the router. The only problem I experienced was getting my Roku connected. My fault for not reading the directions more closely. Since installing my Linksys over two weeks ago, I haven't lost the internet once. My thanks to Cox, Cisco Linksys, and Amazon (for a good price and fast delivery).
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Hirsch

customer_reviews.title: Linksys again provides speed and reliability.
customer_reviews.text: Good value and again Cisco comes through with speed and reliability. I updated from the old G series to the newer N series and this made a great difference in speed, very big. Easy to install and set-up. I opened the box and had the unit working in less than five minutes on two PCs. I have only used the Linksys, so to be fair I don't have experience with other brands but once I find a manufacturer that works trouble free it's hard to switch. The boost is for real as I noticed a big increase in the mbps. I would recommend this unit to anyone who wants to upgrade from their old G series.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Day

customer_reviews.title: Good basic router
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a cascading router to my existing system because it is one of the few that works with the wi-fi module in my alarm system. It's extremely easy to set up and as a basic home router it works fine. I like to do a little more than the basic stuff so I installed dd-wrt firmware to open up some extra features. PROS: Easy installation and set up CONS: RF coverage leaves a little to be desired (compared to other systems)
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: From Molases to Lightning!...in 5 minutes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my old 54 mbps Linksys router, because my connection was so bad, I could even download a youtube video. It was SLOWWWWWW! Hoping this would solve the slow internet problem...and it sure did!! I went from 54 mbps to 144 mbps and it only took 5 minutes to set-up. Set-up is super, super easy! Pop in the disk, follow the on screen easy graphic instructions and in minutes you're done! The design of this is so sleek, modern and cool!...Thin and no antenna's that stick up. Highly reccomend this router!
customer_reviews.author: D. Swan

customer_reviews.title: This is the best wifi router that I have used.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this wifi router for more than two years, and it never had a problem. I never had to reset the wifi router unlike my old D-Link router as well as my new Verizon Modem-Router 2 in 1 router. Normally, I would sell my old router on eBay for some cash, since I loved this router so much, I am gonna keep it just in case if i need it in the future. I would recommend this router to my friends and family members 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Because I'm not a computer savvy type I'll simply state the facts. My old router(now in a box in the garage) seemed o.k.for the first few years I used it but over time developed an inability to multi-task, sort of like a centenarian juggler. Following my instincts, I decided to replace the old router with this new whiz-bang linksys E1500. We have no more virtual traffic jams! All users in the house can do their own thing without even knowing anyone else is home.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with MAC OS 10.8.2
customer_reviews.text: Spent about 4 hr with two different agents. I have the latest Apple software on my MAC desktop, which setup software does not recognize. Also, with my win. XP pro. laptop, I can only log in as guest. After manual setup, which isn't very difficult once you find the manual online, sort of works, but keeps dropping connection. It might be an acceptable router, if they get around to updating their setup software.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: it's like a new Internet service, so fast!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an old Linksys 11Mbit after the cable company was here 3 times replacing its modem and all. we almost changed carrier until we bought this one! all the computers are now "flying" around the Internet, no kidding. maximum speed any time. using "speakeasy" speed test, we hit the max rate of the cable every time. it has all the encryption and setup support as expected these days. yes, I would recommend this wireless router.
customer_reviews.author: Dedde

customer_reviews.title: Works after some tweaks
customer_reviews.text: After following on screen instructions from the included CD, download speeds were severely limited. Found through google searches that you must disable WMM Support in the Applications & Gaming - QOS screen. Also to get the full 300mbps link, I had to set Channel Width to Auto (20 or 40Mhz). Once these steps are done I am getting much better signal than my previous Netgear wireless n router.
customer_reviews.author: R. Demers

customer_reviews.title: Router doesn't deliver the goods...
customer_reviews.text: We have already tried two of these routers from Cisco. Neither would work after the firmware update. We have spent many hours on trying to install this router model; Cisco tech support authorized replacements...we have another one coming...if this new one doesn't work, then we will get a refund and go somewhere else. Too many extra innings...Finally installed the third router, and after a few weeks, download speed slowed to below 1 Mbs. After reinstalling the old router (a Linksys WRT 100 which still works to the old standard) I am currently returning this router for a refund. Cisco, you should know better than to make something that doesn't work!
customer_reviews.author: bhwbass

customer_reviews.title: Downgrade
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to replace a 802.11G linksys router. After installing, I did a speed test on my Macbook Pro to find that my download speed decreased from 12mbps to 1mbps. Reinstalled the old router and the speed was back around 12mbps. Three attempts at webchat with 3 different supports techs was a waste of 3 hours of time. So much for upgrading and "speedboost." Returned product to Amazon for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: easy setup and sleek design
customer_reviews.text: Setup was simple. I'm not sure why they still ship CDs for installation though. Cisco can save costs if they just made the installation web based. My earlier linksys WRT54G served me well for many years ~6-7yrs, but suddenly stopped broadcasting wireless signal and only allowed wired connections. Time to upgrade and I decided to stick to Linksys since I've had a good experience with the WRT54G.
customer_reviews.author: modz

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up-no problems with it yet
customer_reviews.text: So far this product has worked very well, I haven't noticed much difference with speed because its the computer that's more the problem. In any case I've had no problems with the set up both on the connections to my items and hooking it up. Slim design is nice but laying it in the intended fashion does take up space. Range seems to be adaquate for my 700 sq ft unit. No complaints yet.
customer_reviews.author: JAW058

customer_reviews.title: Speed similar to dial up.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to upgrade a previous Linksys product which began running slowly. This replacement was supposedly brand new and the performance has been dismal at best. My speed is as slow as old dial up. I have only three computers, no tablets, no phones and I have to wait many seconds, sometimes a full minute to do basic searches or pay bills. My house is only 2300 square feet in a close-in suburb of a major city. Currently searching for another product. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: bbargil

customer_reviews.title: has worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: since I bough this router last year it has worked perfectly, no problems at all, the reception is nice my sister get's the signal and she is upstairs my roommate uses it 2 rooms away from mine, I even downloaded an app for Cisco products so that i can manage the router from my iPhone instead of using my PC. configuration is very easy, I've been in touch with Cisco products for a long time, and I know kind of how to go through the advance settings and everything; anybody can set-up this router without problems
customer_reviews.author: luisk23

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good!
customer_reviews.text: Small, lightweight, easy to set up! Downloaded the latest firmware from the Linksys website rather than using the disc it came with (was probably faster that way too) and had the router up and running in minutes! Really liked this because I know NOTHING about setting up networks. Range is pretty good for the price too, even in an older house with thick walls. Pretty good value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Nick F.

customer_reviews.title: and all I had to do was unplug wait 30 seconds and it worked fine! Why pay for routers from Internet providers save ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had it over a year now and I have only lost internet connection twice, and all I had to do was unplug wait 30 seconds and it worked fine! Why pay for routers from Internet providers save money with purchasing you own router! :)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany G.

customer_reviews.title: It is good, but there are newer ones available from Linksys.
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with firmware that did not work correctly. I got on the line with Linksys System support and they found that my firmware was back level. They said they would update it for $100. Since that was $30 more than I paid for the router, I said no thank you. I logged on to their website and was able to find and download the latest firmware. It took some effort on my part, but the router now works perfectly. Before you buy, check the Linksys website, you might be able to get it for a better price.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rush

customer_reviews.title: Faulty device, bad range
customer_reviews.text: I may have received one of the bad ones but this router is giving me bad wifi range and keeps dropping constantly. I checked other wifi devices around me to see what range they were in to avoid any conflicts and set a manual channel but still had issues. Wired connections seem to work fine for now but being that I have had so much trouble with the wireless it may end up failing completely soon. Bad purchase for me... wouldn't recommend to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: The little Router that could
customer_reviews.text: This little guy rocks, it does everything described within the feature set. I had a Linksys wireless router back in 2003 which is why I wanted to get another one since I needed it, I had a great experience with them in the past and it looks like that will continue with the E1500. While I could provide you with an elaborate break down of the functionality of this thing, just trust that my tech savvy skills are way above average and that will do what you need it to for most users out there.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous performance improvement
customer_reviews.text: This router was a snap to install, and is incredibly fast. My wireless devices now work just as fast as my desktop. Very reliable. My previous Netgear router kept requiring resets any time Windows updated (i.e., six times a week). The Linksys router is very stable and reliable. Great value for a modest price.
customer_reviews.author: David Bienenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work well . . so I returned it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed a 'stronger' signal throughout my house. A friend had good luck with a similar Linksys product. But not me. Not only was the signal not strong, all of my devices would not even connect to it . . thus I returned it. What else can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Linksys E-1500 Router
customer_reviews.text: I knew nothing about WiFi and bought this device on a whim. I must admit that I was right for once. This router was easy to set up and it exceeded my expectation, servicing a laptop downstairs and a tablet and notebook upstairs. I have a cable TV and Telephone service and it was easy to connect the modem to the telephone line. The only bad thing is that our cable service sometimes goes KAPUT and ceases to work. But that isn't the router's fault.
customer_reviews.author: Nina K. Garry

customer_reviews.title: All I expected and more!
customer_reviews.text: The easiest router set up I have ever done. I was surprised that there was NO NEED TO HARDWIRE CONNECT during the setup! My download/upload speeds are much better than what I had with my old 802.11g Web pages pop onto the screen and my ipod syncs faster.
customer_reviews.author: Atheist1696

customer_reviews.title: a pain in the arse the setting for mac
customer_reviews.text: Well, for mac users it is a headache -it doesn't mean you can't do it- because you need different sources and reading to set this thing up; however you can learn stuff. After that it works perfectly. I have had for some months and it hasn't failed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Leos

customer_reviews.title: No issues after 5 years
customer_reviews.text: Bought 5 years ago. Never had any issues. Sometimes have to reset it if the connection is slow, but that is rarely necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Although the router was very easy to set up. The signal was a bit weaker than my previous wrt54gs. So now I have 2 routers with not so strong distance coverage.Relying on the first thing that I was attracted to on the selling points was extended distance coverage. However I was most disappointed after I replaced the older router and to discover that the signal was in fact WEAKER.
customer_reviews.author: tubercolosis69

customer_reviews.title: Been working flawlessly for months now
customer_reviews.text: When you buy something that does what it's supposed to do without giving grief, ya kinda forget about it, which is what I did with this beauty. But then I've had nothing but good luck with Linksys products over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Gray Beard

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I had an old wireless router that was working fine, but I did not get very good reception in some parts of the house. So I decided to upgrade and bought this router. I am very satisfied! Now I have very good reception all over the house, and I think I also have more speed.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: This replaces an older model Linksys router (WRT54GS) and this router is easier to set up than the old one. It only took me 10 minutes total to install--maybe less. This has a nicer thinner and sleeker design and no more antennas sticking out and the blinking lights are at the back and no longer in the front. I chose this over the E1200 which is about $20 less because of the speedboost feature and expanded range but I really haven't really noticed anything extraordinary in speed and range. Anyway, I am very happy with this purchase and trust the Linksys name.
customer_reviews.author: May Weather

customer_reviews.title: LINKSYS is trash
customer_reviews.text: Unable to get HELP from Cisco or Linksys Set up of unit i loaded the program. It stops at 25% and will not finish I have contacted them. They will not return my calls I have asked them to call me in a 12hr period 12 am to 12noon est I have to work for a living and cant sit by the phone 24/7/365 NOT SURE IF AMAZON will let me return this or not Thanks for letting me rant (POOR PROD.Service) Yep Amazon took it back THANKS TO Amazon (its in the mail)This is the last item I buy from Linksys or cisco I know it will hard but i will hunt it out NO More Linksys Or CISCO
customer_reviews.author: R & S Hall

customer_reviews.title: Bought for the Office
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our office and it does the job well. We mainly use this as a access point for guests while our internal network remains protected with Cisco access points.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry McMannamy

customer_reviews.title: Goodies shipped a product that is defective
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this E 1500 router from Goodios via Amazon. I spent about six hours on the Cisco service chat site trying to get it to work without success. I also engaged a local expert without success. Hence , I tried to return it only to discovery that Goodios expected me to pay the return postage for a clearly defective product. Amazon, to their credit offered to pay the return postage. I will never again order anything from Goodios and you shouldn't either.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Melcher

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Totally clueless about routers and bought this one since other reviewers said it was easy to install. Happy to say they were right. Works great, fast speed and strong signals. I live in a high-rise apartment in NYC.
customer_reviews.author: Bonbon

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: This product was defective. The manufacturer went thru several troubleshooting procedures to determine that the product was defective, leaving me to buy one locally. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Genie

customer_reviews.title: Terrific little router
customer_reviews.text: Installed easily and runs consistently, unlike the Netgear one this replaced, which was down half te time and required rebooting.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love my router, arrived in excellent condition and now I can be connected from any room in my apartment having Internet connection. A great buy
customer_reviews.author: Patty P.

customer_reviews.title: Linksys E1500 Wireless-N Router w/speedboost
customer_reviews.text: Beats my old Belkin. Easy set-up for any beginners or pros. Priced right for your pocket. And great for Amazon Prime members get SHIPPING $0.00 two day. Recommend this highly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Penn

customer_reviews.title: Good Home Router
customer_reviews.text: CISCO does networking better than any one else. This is a very simple to use and reliable router. It's range isn't as great as others, but for the price, it is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Classic_Rock_fan

customer_reviews.title: Nice but would like status lights on the front
customer_reviews.text: Plug and play, works great. Has status LEDs on the network plugs on the back, however I would prefer to have status lights on the front instead - so I can see at a glance that things are working without having to turn it around
customer_reviews.author: Alz

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, works great
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely painless and easy install, worked the first time, and has worked flawlessly since. No complaints. Highly recommended to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Greg J. Lovern

customer_reviews.title: Linksys Wireless- N Router
customer_reviews.text: I installed this router in a large home-office to connect 3 computers into a simple network. The installation was quick and easy and the users are delighted with the speed, security and reliability. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product works well
customer_reviews.text: The most anyone may ask for in ordering sight unknown is that you not only get the product and for a fair price, but the product works. With this said, I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little router
customer_reviews.text: Linksys E1500 arrived quickly, was easy to set up and has worked from the first attempt. I recommend this router for small setups.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Powers

customer_reviews.title: Linksys Router
customer_reviews.text: Needed to update my existing router. The Linksys E1500 does everything it says it does. I needed more power for reception throughout my house. This unit reached all corners without any reception problems. Great unit.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Linksys E1500 Wireless
customer_reviews.text: Linksys E1500 Wireless-N Router with SpeedBoost i Love it It is very good wireless router for home ( so cool :))))) )
customer_reviews.author: Gio

customer_reviews.title: router
customer_reviews.text: After a month, I'm more than pleased with my new router. It was easy to install and works perfectly. I was so happy I bought a second one for our cabin connection.
customer_reviews.author: R Vancleve

customer_reviews.title: really slow for me somehow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this router after reading all the good comments but for somehow it didn't work for me at all. I tried several times, gave it some time to settle or whatnot but it was no use. It took forever to load youtube videos and it was just so slow. It was way slower than my 3 year old router so I had to return it, although I liked the design of it. It's very sleek and modern.
customer_reviews.author: mymikah

customer_reviews.title: Linksys E-1500
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with my old Linksys router. I went surching for a new router fund the new linksys e-1500. bought it. works great.
customer_reviews.author: a.s.

customer_reviews.title: Works OK
customer_reviews.text: I decided to get this one over the E900 and E1200 to get extra range. This dose not allow me to get more than 20feet away before the signal drops way down. Looking at it through my window on the front porch about 10 feet away it drops in and out. Allthough very glad to have something that works OK.....would look for one with a stronger signal nex time.
customer_reviews.author: jon gould

customer_reviews.title: Linksys E1500 Sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy a Linksys E1500 router! It is constantly losing connection to the Internet and it losses packets every time I ping any web site. I will never buy another of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Vi

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set up, I even figured it out. If I need another wireless router I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: rex m jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great Router, Setup not Lion compatible yet
customer_reviews.text: Great Router but it has to be manually setup if you are using a Mac with Lion OSX. Manual setup is not that difficult however it is annoying since its a brand new router and it would have been nice using the setup disk. Asides from that one flaw, which hopefully they will update soon, the speed and reliability is much better than previous linksys routers that I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: CCinBK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product and it has done exactly what it was designed to do. Have had no problems whatsoever. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tennis ace

customer_reviews.title: Linksys E1500 Wireless-N Router with SpeedBoost
customer_reviews.text: This wireless router serves the needs of 4 internet connections: My son's PC, my daughter-in-law's tablet, my grandson's PC, and my own. Good product & reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN M FUNG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This product works great with all my products that i use on wifi (Apple and Windows) . Did not come with instructions so you may need to get a friend or relative to help with setting up security keys. Otherwise, works great and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: cesar valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Linksys E1500 Wireless-N router with SpeedBoost
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Small and compact but big on processing. It was easy to install. I am very pleased with my order.
customer_reviews.author: E. Reason

customer_reviews.title: won;t work with vonage
customer_reviews.text: the product would work for 4 days with my vonage voice over device and then it would go off and I would have no internet service. After many hours talking to tech people at both Vonage and Cisco no one was able to resolve the problem. They all told me the two were campatible but they could not amke it work
customer_reviews.author: sc

customer_reviews.title: ... as long as I expected it to and wouldn't recommend that particular brand to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I felt cheated since it didn't last as long as I expected it to and wouldn't recommend that particular brand to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for me. Hooked it up...put the disc in...online. Simple as that. Played games no problem too.
customer_reviews.author: Working Joe

customer_reviews.title: You have to be in the same room to get full connection speed. WTH?
customer_reviews.text: You have to be in the same room to get full connection speed. WTH? Else your speed drop down to dog slow like dial up speed. It was working fine for about a few weeks but then I got this connection speed problem.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I use this at my summer home as I work from there during the summer. Have not had any problems, and the wireless signal is strong enough that someone down the road from our camp is able to use my connection.
customer_reviews.author: Jack M

customer_reviews.title: Sets up and works just the way you hope
customer_reviews.text: No surprises with this router. Set up is simple and works as you'd expect. My only complaint is that I couldn't figure out how to set up a guest network with no password. Password seems to be required, even for a guest network.
customer_reviews.author: wmjt001

customer_reviews.title: Works like described
customer_reviews.text: This router was very easy to set up and get to work. We have three computers an a blu-ray player hooked up and have had no problems thus far...
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: moderate high value
customer_reviews.text: It's worth to buy. Though the price is seem to be high, it works great. A bit trouble in setting process but it's fine to handle.
customer_reviews.author: T A

customer_reviews.title: doesnt work!!! i can't even see wireless ...
customer_reviews.text: doesnt work !!! i can't even see wireless SSID in 10 ft !
customer_reviews.author: Nika Beridze

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement
customer_reviews.text: Works well as a replacement for a unit that quit working. Hopefully this item will not need to be replaced in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Hard to set up.
customer_reviews.text: I am not using this anymore because it was way to hard to set up and the signle failed several times for no reason. My internet installer couldn't figure it out either.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but gets disconnected often
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this product when I first purchased it, but after a few months, the router started to get disconnected often, so I had to reset it frequently.
customer_reviews.author: HappyBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Review - Linksys E1500 Wireless N Router wSpeedBoost
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product! I like it. The build quality, design, speed give you more bang for your buck. It was easy to set up. Doesn't require resetting at all. I haven't had to reset it, since the day I bought it. (Aug 25, 2011). This is much better than D-LINK router I previously owned which more often than not needed a daily reset.
customer_reviews.author: SSK

customer_reviews.title: Great Router
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this router for about a month. The setup was very easy. I am not a technie but I had no problem. It only took me about 10 minutes. I have a two story home and I can get a signal anywhere in my house. If you want a reliable router at a reasonable price - this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Linksys E1500 Wireless-N Router
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase. The router performs well and the wireless connection is stable. The installation was simple and flawless. [..]
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: Dead after a year
customer_reviews.text: I used to think Linksys were reliable, easy-to-use routers, but this is the third one I've had in the past 5 years. Needed regular rebooting (monthly) and finally died after a year, similar to the previous two.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Smith

customer_reviews.title: wifi range not very good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this N-router as I was told that the newer technology would have better range than my old G-router, which is many years old. Unfortunately, the wifi range for the new router was far inferior to the old so the N-router is being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Teatime2

customer_reviews.title: Good router
customer_reviews.text: We live in a rural area and our cable strength is not very good but we decided to try a router anyway and this router has worked out great. It is in the second floor of our farmhouse and I can get on the Internet outside on my porch!
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: Linksys is an excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: If you are not a technological wizard, yet want to enjoy wireless capabilities, this is the product for you. Easy to install very reliable,fast and consistent. Linksys E1500 Wireless-N Router is excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: working ok so far
customer_reviews.text: Had problem installing. took long time then finally I went to some website and did reset and then installed ok. after 1 week it stopped working so i had do disconnect and reconnect it and so far working ok.
customer_reviews.author: indian

customer_reviews.title: don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item. Installation instructions in box did not work. Tried multiple times. Finally got it to work after my 23 year old son was able to install not using the instructions provided by vendor. It was sooooo slow. Tried a new cable. It was so much slower than the 6 year old one that we replaced, I tossed this one and went to a major chain store and bought one from a competitor of linksys. I'm out the price of this one, but at least I have an wireless internet connection that works.
customer_reviews.author: deb r

customer_reviews.title: Linksys e1500 review
customer_reviews.text: The product was easy to install and set up. I bought it so I could use my kindle wirelessly at home and it has been a great router so far
customer_reviews.author: Bronze Deer

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: my sister recommended this for me. . .and it is much better than my old one. Am able to use 'facetime' on Ipad now without any blackouts.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Begin

customer_reviews.title: Just installed my Linksys E 1500 two hours ago!
customer_reviews.text: Installation went very well. Unit is performing as I hoped. I only need to improve my user skill with it! Very happy with it so far!!!
customer_reviews.author: Roger McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Range Inadequate
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for about six weeks. It was easy to set up and it works fine. The range though is lousy. It replaced a Lynksys WRT54G. That one had double the range.
customer_reviews.author: We're Here

customer_reviews.title: It DOES work with Vonage and it is fast, you just need to disable multimedia preference on QOS
customer_reviews.text: Update the firmware to the latest level, reset it to factory defaults, customize it to your own network, and DISABLE the multimedia flag in the QOS tab. Done! Great speeds and a great connection...
customer_reviews.author: Santos Dumont

customer_reviews.title: Not a good range
customer_reviews.text: if you are looking for a router with good range, this is not the one. Is not strong enough to pass strong walls.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Worth a little extra money for the extra range on this one.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this router for about 3 months now and it's worked flawlessly. The better amplifier inside this e1500 version is worth the extra twenty bucks over the e1200 because it's made the range much better at my house than any previous router I've owned. I haven't had to restart this thing at all. It runs nice and cool and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup runs great no problem with speed I can run a xbox and a laptop along with a cell phone with ease
customer_reviews.author: merchie

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Router
customer_reviews.text: This product works so much better than my old wireless router. It's faster and doesn't have to be reset to ket it working. Has a greater signal strength.
customer_reviews.author: cwp

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade from old router
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is I had no problems and install was very easy. Great upgrade reasonable price Get it it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: ReginaV69

customer_reviews.title: Lyksys E1500
customer_reviews.text: I found the Cisco E1500 performed as advertised. Easy Set Up, very pleased with purchase, and would highly recommend to anyone needing a moderate priced WiFi connection.
customer_reviews.author: Herb D.

customer_reviews.title: Bad router
customer_reviews.text: The router needs to be powered off every other day else the speeds drop to 1 Mbps. Even after a power cycle, it does not deliver optimal speeds. Waste of money and their support means nothing. Buy a better router, not this piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Drun

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance
customer_reviews.text: This router was terrible for me. It dropped signal way to often. I used to be a linksys fan, but not after three different models. I ended up buying the Asus black diamond. It is a great router.
customer_reviews.author: Topo

customer_reviews.title: Not what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item but after I received it I decided to trade up to the Linksys E2500. It had more capacity and features for my home wireless network. There was nothing wrong with it , but I wanted a better unit. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: susan geminder

customer_reviews.title: Excellent installation
customer_reviews.text: This could not have been simpler setup. I had it up and running in 5 minutes. However I gave it 4 stars because it took Amazon a week to ship it out and it was in stock. Now read what I wrote about the ae1500 "N" adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Not easy at all
customer_reviews.text: I put the disk in and within less than a minute it told me that I had to go through some involved manual procedure and I just hung it up. Not for me to give up my day or days coping with what was to be an easy install. I hope to find a product which will install as easily as advertised. I am taking a breather right now.
customer_reviews.author: jwr

customer_reviews.title: Extremely difficult setup for experienced user
customer_reviews.text: This is about the tenth wireless router I have configured, and it was by far the most difficult. In their effort to make setup easy for newbies, the wireless setup was extremely confusing for me. For example, it asks for a name and password for the router. Nowhere was I told that this was the network name and password! And nowhere was I told what kind of authentication was being used. I still don't know. It eventually took over an hour to get working, and I still don't have bi-directional wireless communication with my printer established. Bottom line, I sure wish that Cisco provided an "experienced user" setup!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No wall mount option
customer_reviews.text: The product works great but there appears to be no provision for wall mounting. With the old case design you could pop off the rubber feet, screw them to the wall and mount the router back on the feet. Luckily I still had the feet stuck on the wall from the old router so I was able to criss cross some 1/8 inch bungee cord between the feet to act as a cradle for the new router. Seems to work well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rodders

product_meta.title: Linksys E1500 Wireless-N Router with SpeedBoost
product_meta.description:
The Linksys E1500 combines fast speed (up to 300 Mbps), extended range, and amplified signal strength to offer enhanced performance for everyday wireless activities. A MIMO antenna array provides expanded range for your wireless network, and SpeedBoost technology increases signal strength across greater distances for maximum wireless coverage and in-home mobility. WPA/WPA2 encryption and SPI firewall help keep your network protected. Plus, included Cisco Connect software gets you set up in three easy steps and offers powerful tools for ongoing management of your network.

AMAZON.COM




FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 

The Linksys E1500 offers fast speed and expanded range with Wireless-N technology plus a next-generation industrial design
(see larger image) The Linksys E1500 combines fast speed (up to 300 Mbps), extended range, and amplified signal strength to offer enhanced performance for everyday wireless activities. A MIMO antenna array provides expanded range for your wireless network, and SpeedBoost technology increases signal strength across greater distances for maximum wireless coverage and in-home mobility. WPA/WPA2 encryption and SPI firewall help keep your network protected. Plus, included Cisco Connect software gets you set up in three easy steps and offers powerful tools for ongoing management of your network.

See how the E1500 stacks up against the rest of the Linksys E-Series routers below.

KEY FEATURES
FAST WIRELESS SPEED
The Linksys E1500 offers fast speed to connect your computers, wireless printers and other Wi-Fi devices at transfer rates up to 300 Mbps speed.


EXTENDED WIRELESS COVERAGE
Built with leading 802.11n wireless technology, the Linksys E1500 offers expanded range to create a powerful wireless network. MIMO antenna array boosts signal strength to provide reliable coverage so you can enjoy your wireless network from anywhere in your home.


SPEEDBOOST
High-power amplifiers increase signal strength across greater distances for maximum wireless coverage and in-home mobility.



The rear of the Linksys E1500 with four Ethernet ports ADVANCED SECURITY
Keep Wi-Fi freeloaders and Internet threats at bay with WPA/WPA2 encryption and SPI firewall to help keep your network protected.


Easy set-up with Cisco Connect software. QUICK TO INSTALL
Cisco Connect software helps you set up your home wireless network in three easy steps.


EASY TO MANAGE
Cisco Connect software helps you customize your settings and quickly add multiple devices to your network:

 * Create a separate password protected network for guests 
 * Limit access time and websites with Parental Controls 
 * Access advanced network settings easily
